faqs.question: What is the Quick Access Panel and how do I use it?
faqs.answer:
### Overview
The Quick Access Panel is your primary hub for essential Cats Blender Plugin functions. It provides quick access to the most commonly used features and important information.

[image]https://cdn.neoneko.xyz/catsblenderplugin/website/wikicurrent/quickaccess1.png[/image]

### Key Features

 **Update Notifications**
At the top of the panel, you'll see notifications about available updates for the plugin. This helps you stay current with the latest features and fixes.

 **Version Compatibility**
The panel displays important warnings about Blender version compatibility:
- Notifications for older Blender versions (below 4.2)
- Warnings for newer versions (above 4.3)
- Alpha version notifications

 **Main Actions**

**Import/Export Section**
- Import Any Model: Quickly import various 3D model formats
- Export Button: Available when you have armatures in your scene
- Models Menu: Access additional import/export options

[image]https://cdn.neoneko.xyz/catsblenderplugin/website/wikicurrent/quickaccess2.png[/image]

**Armature Selection**
- When multiple armatures are present, easily switch between them using the dropdown menu

**Quick Tools**
- Combine Materials: Merge multiple materials into one for better optimization
- Join Meshes: Combine multiple mesh objects into a single mesh

[image]https://cdn.neoneko.xyz/catsblenderplugin/website/wikicurrent/quickaccess3.png[/image]

#### Pose Mode Controls
- Start Pose Mode: Enter pose mode with or without resetting the pose
- Stop Pose Mode: Exit pose mode with options to keep or reset the current pose
- When in pose mode:
  - Create Shape Key from Pose: Convert the current pose into a shape key
  - Apply as Rest Pose: Set the current pose as the default pose

[note]The Quick Access Panel adapts its interface based on your current selection and Blender's state, showing only relevant options for your current task.[/note]
